header.description:
This game was originally created by BOWLG. I have added to this. 

°Redesigned the buttons
°Added sound effects 
°Added more zombie animation 
°Added kill counter 
°Player HP
°Levels (4 total) 
°Game win Screen 
°Game Over Screen 
°Jump over Zombies (with continues button prrss) 
°Limit on special weapon
°Special weapon refill (sphere) 
I hope you like the remix 
Also sorry for the spaghetti code. I didn't plan it out so kept adding to one idea after the next. 

Don't forget to check out BOWLG original game. 

Find me on plus.google.com/+FrankX
header.title: Sword Play - with Zombies!
header.author: FrankX
